elements pob pob Element
pob &pob.purpose;
&pob.synopsis.gen; Description
POB is a post office box number in an Address.
Processing expectations
&format.inline; In an Address, this element may inherit the verbatim qualities of an address.
&pob.parents.gen; &pob.children.gen;
See Also &pob.seealso.gen;
Examples
For examples, see &pob.example.seealso.gen;.
